content.rendered: Pusat kamera CCTV Uniview, kami menyediakan Kamera CCTV CCTV Camera Uniview NVR308-64R untuk anda dengan harga murah. Kamera CCTV Uniview CCTV Camera Uniview NVR308-64R dapat membantu anda dalam menjaga aset di dalam bangunan ataupun luar bangunan. Uniview CCTV Camera Uniview NVR308-64R tipe kamera pengawas yang memiliki kelebihan spesifikasi yakni: 64-channel input Third-party IP cameras supported with ONVIF conformance Support 2-ch HDMI, 1-ch VGA, 1-ch CVBS, HDMI2 at up to 4K(3840×2160) resolution Up to 12 Megapixels resolution recording Support H.265/H.264 video formats Accurate retrieval, instant playback Support HDD hot swap with RAID1, 5 storage scheme configurable 8 SATA HDDs, Up to 8TB for each HDD Support various VCA detection alarm and VCA search Support N+1 Hot spare Support for 12V Power output Support for P2P, UPnP, NTP, DHCP, PPPoE Support for mobile client access
